description: On a stage, a presenter introduces the author of a book titled "Mind over Matter." However, the author, a visibly overweight man, is shown physically stuck trying to squeeze through a narrow gap between a curtain and a wooden beam to get onto the stage. This predicament creates a sharp irony, directly contradicting the premise of his book which suggests mental power can overcome physical limitations. The scene highlights an absurd failure of "mind over matter" in a simple physical act. An audience waits, witnessing the author's struggle.
caption: "And so, without further ado, here's the author of Mind over Matter ..."
